document_data.name: Wigglefingers
document_data.Description:
Wigglefingers wore a mustache.

One of his chief responsibilities in the guild was casting spells to determine the location of oysters that would suitable for the cultivation of pink [[pearl]]s. He also cast spells of [[water breathing]] and furnished [[Spider Parrafin]] with potions of water breathing.
document_data.Relationships: Wigglefingers was Pericolo Topolino's closest friend and advisor, as well as a captain of Morada Topolino. They grew up together on Delthuntle's streets.
